name: Tattered Hat
desc: Itchy and filthy, it offers almost no protection

name: Worn Gloves
desc: The gloves of a worker. They offer little-to-know actual defense.

name: Farmer's Boots
desc: Farmers don't normally fight horrific monsters, so these aren't exactly reassuring.

name: Cook's Ring
desc: A cook's best friend, this little trinket offers defense against not checking your stovetop before you touch it.
